contestDescription: Unleash your creativity and design a unique logo for our upcoming product launch. Impress us with your artistic skills and stand a chance to win amazing prizes!
taskSubmissionTextInstruction: Submit your logo design in PNG or SVG format, ensuring it is high-resolution and includes both a light and dark background version.

contestDescription: Share your thoughts and insights on a topic of your choice. The best article will be featured on our blog and the author will receive a special prize!
taskSubmissionTextInstruction: Submit your article as a Word document with a minimum of 1500 words and ensure it is well-researched and original.

contestDescription: Develop a groundbreaking marketing strategy for our new product line. Showcase your marketing expertise and compete for a substantial cash prize!
taskSubmissionTextInstruction: Submit a detailed marketing strategy document in PDF format, including market analysis, target audience, and execution plan.

contestDescription: Create an innovative digital advertisement for our latest campaign. Stand out with your creativity and win fantastic prizes!
taskSubmissionTextInstruction: Submit your digital advertisement in MP4 format, with a maximum duration of 30 seconds. Ensure it is high-quality and engaging.

contestDescription: Review the latest game releases and share your in-depth analysis. The best review will be published on our website, and the winner will receive an exclusive prize!
taskSubmissionTextInstruction: Submit your game review in Word or PDF format, with a minimum of 1000 words. Include gameplay screenshots and personal insights.

contestDescription: Write a compelling review of your favorite book and stand a chance to win exciting prizes. The best review will be featured on our blog!
taskSubmissionTextInstruction: Submit your book review in Word or PDF format, with a minimum of 800 words. Include a summary and your personal reflections.

contestDescription: Pitch your innovative business idea and win funding to bring it to life. The best idea will receive a substantial cash prize and mentorship opportunities!
taskSubmissionTextInstruction: Submit a detailed business plan in PDF format, including market research, financial projections, and implementation strategy.

contestDescription: Review the latest blockbuster and share your thoughts. The best review will be featured on our platform, and the winner will receive a special prize!
taskSubmissionTextInstruction: Submit your movie review in Word or PDF format, with a minimum of 900 words. Include your analysis of the plot, characters, and cinematography.
